sameAnalysis.part_name: 这几个词用作形容词时均含"少量的"之意。
means: little ： 只修饰不可数名词，含否定意义。
few ： 只修饰可数名词的复数形式，侧重指数量非常少，给人一种模糊概念，含否定意义。
several ： 修饰可数名词的复数形式，指至少有3个，但不会超过5、6个。

sentence.Network_en: Several proposals are under consideration by the state assembly.
sentence.Network_cn: 有几个提案州议会正在讨论中。

sentence.Network_en: He entered for many competitions, winning several gold medals.
sentence.Network_cn: 他参加过多次比赛，赢得了数枚金牌。

sentence.Network_en: Several hundred workers struck in sympathy with their colleagues.
sentence.Network_cn: 几百名工人罢工以声援他们的同事。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French, from medieval Latin separalis, from Latin separ 'separate, different'

entry.def: Several is used to refer to an imprecise number of people or things that is not large but is greater than two.

example.ex: I had lived two doors away from this family for several years...
example.tran: 我和这家人是好几年的邻居了，中间就隔着两家。

example.ex: Several blue plastic boxes under the window were filled with record albums...
example.tran: 窗下的几个蓝色塑料盒里装满了唱片。

means.word_mean: 3. (used with count nouns) of an indefinite number more than 2 or 3 but not many;

sentences.sentence: "several people were injured in the accident"

auth_sentence.content: Several species being replaced by one is never good.

Sentence.sentence: This company has built automated garages in several countries overseas and in the United States for residents of a Washington, D.C. apartment building.

If you tell an acquaintance you are a grandfather who recently lost his wife and who does volunteer work on weekends, several elements of your self-image are bought to light — the roles of grandparent, widower and conscientious citizen
Her son Doug is one of several hundred thousand high-school seniors who had a painful fall.

means.word_mean: 几个, 数个, 一些

sentences.en: I go there several times each year.
Can you give several other examples?

means.word_mean: 各自的, 各别的; 不同的

sentences.en: Several of the children were in the garden.

jushi.english: I go there several times each year.
Can you give several other examples?
